title: pls help me fast
body:
so i was downloading the game from launcher it was about 4335 mg 
suddenly my mom turned of them Wi-Fi my download was interrupted about 1300 mg were left
once i reconnected the wifi it started to download it from the start point 4335 mg (and i dont have that much traffic  on my wifi left i guess about 3 g are left) so i cant download it again can some one pls help me how to solve this?

replies.body:
It's unfortunate that your wifi was disconnected mid-download, but we don't have a way to restart your download from where you left off. This is because once the download was interrupted, some of the files it was downloading could have been corrupted. In order to get a stable download, you'll need to download the game from start to finish. 

If you won't be able to use your home wifi to download it again due to your data cap, you could always try using a local library or somewhere that has free wifi to try downloading it again.

ty but i live in a country that the highest internet speed is 16 mg per sec 
so the free internet places wont have that much speed for 4335 mg 
but thanks anyway i will buy some more traffic for my wifi then
